entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
